content: this is a free crochet pattern to make a funny hot dog pdf version is available for purchase on my website here 1 this hot dog makes for great summer home decor or a funny gag for your 4th of july party or just a heart warming gift for any hot dog lover out there **supplies ** 4 0mm crochet hook stuffing tapestry needle scissors 8mm safety eyes **yarn used ** 4/medium weight in red brown yellow and tan **additional information ** pattern difficulty **easy** we start by making the head after that we make his nose and ears then we assemble the face next we make the body arms/legs tail and bun after assembly we make the ketchup and mustard on top 1 https //stringydingding com/product/hot-dog-pdf/
